room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: I've been to Breakout 3 times in the last six months, and I absolutely LOVE it there! The rooms I've done (the casino, the train, and the museum) have all had great set-ups and puzzles, and a really nice variety of both types of clues and the things the clues open! And the gamemasters have all been great! I highly recommend Breakout to anyone who enjoys escape rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: Had a great time!! Shawn was a great game master. We did the train one and it was so challenging but in a good way! You should definitely try this out

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: This was our first time doing this, and apparently we chose the hardest one - Runaway Train. It was definitely full engagement from the start, sorting through the clues to get to the next step. Thankfully you can shout out for help to keep you moving forward. A great family experience - we were there with our daughter and were brain-dead at the end. We'll be back.
